attributes.review: I opened the app and I immediately felt something strange churn inside my stomach. I was pregnant! I thought to myself this canâ€™t be right?? I donâ€™t have a Uterus. The app must have sensed I was pregnant and wanted an abortion so it high jacked my phoneâ€™s audio and started calling me a baby killer. I tried to turn it off (which the app didnâ€™t like). Next thing I knew I was strapped down with Kellyanne Conway pumping my blood with bleach (to prevent Covid-19), while rambling on about the benefits of a Christian education. THEN Fox News broke into my living room and threatened to sing Christian gospel non-stop unless I pledged to vote for Donald Trump. 10/10 WOULDNâ€™t recommend.
attributes.title: CAUSES PREGNANCY

attributes.title: BAD APP!

attributes.review: i was living happily with my wife of 7 years and our three beautiful children when i installed this app. My friend recommended it, said their chicken wings were delicious and usually arrived within 3-5 business days and my son richard cunningham IV was about to celebrate his fourth birthday, so i decided why not get him something special, however when i installed it there was a knock at the door and donald trump himself forced himself into my house and murdered my entire family in cold blood. And on top of that my chicken strips didnâ€™t arrive until two months later and they were soggy. Would rate 0/5 if i could.
attributes.title: chicken strips are soggy
